about_the_game:
Shelter of Exiles is a strategic action MMORPG in hack&slash style with high risk = high reward mechanics in challenging modes. Developed for tryhards and players who demand more from gaming.



High Risk = High Reward
Only you define your skill limits. Will you play it safe or risk all your loot for greater rewards?

Strategy and Real-Time Combat
Command in real-time on a hexagonal map. Be smart, be fast, and outthink your enemies.

Multiple Difficulty Modes
Traverse the lands of forgotten Losvia in various game modes – from strategic battles to pure hack & slash mayhem.

No Class Restrictions
Experience the freedom to define your unique combat style with limitless customization options.



Advanced Stats and Equipment System
Diverse weapons? Custom skill tree setups? Stat calculations? It's all here!

Regular Updates and New Content
We constantly enhance gameplay, adding new modes, skill sets, and weapons. Stay engaged with regular updates and community events.

Always Free-to-Play, Never Pay-to-Win
Victory is earned, not bought. Enjoy a fair and balanced experience for all adventurers.
